src_original: bhāvanādhigamaḥ prajñāpāramitābhiyuktānāṃ /  śūnyatāprativedhaḥ advayaprativedhabhāvanābhiyuktānāṃ /  niṣpattiḥ sarvapāramitāsaṃbhārasya /
punar aparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara iyaṃ nāmasaṃgītiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ aśeṣakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācārapāpapraśamanī /
śaraṇaṃ śaraṇārthināṃ /  layanaṃ layanārthināṃ /  trāṇaṃ trāṇārthināṃ /
ye cānye devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāś ca ye cānye  caturthacakrasyeyam anuśaṃsā tatpadāny ekonaviṃśati //
punar aparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara ya imāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ nāmacūḍāmaṇiṃ pratyaham akhaṇḍasamādānatas triḥkṛtvā kaṇṭhagatām āvartayiṣyati /
bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasatvasya rūpam ālambayann anuvicintayaṃs tadrūpam anudhyāyan /
gaganatalagatāṃś ca sarvabuddhabodhisatvān nānānirmāṇarūpakāyaiḥ sahagatān drakṣyati /
na tasya mahāsatvasya jātu kadācit kathamapi durgatyapāyapatanaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
nīcakulopapattir na bhaviṣyati /  pratyantajanapadopapattir na bhaviṣyati /
na hīnendriyo bhaviṣyati /  na vikalendriyo bhaviṣyati /
sa yatra yatropapatsyate tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati /
